title: [Epidemiology] Swedish research with 1.8 million people, on COVID vaccination and reduced household transmission. Non-immune family members had a 45 to 97 per cent lower risk of infection and hospitalization, as the number of immune family members increased.
[Medicine] Increased lethality in influenza and SARS-CoV-2 coinfection is prevented by influenza immunity but not SARS-CoV-2 immunity
